pages.title: Steller's Sea Cow
pages.text: Steller's sea cow ($(o)Hydrodamalis gigas$()) is an extinct sirenian described by Georg Wilhelm Steller in 1741.$(br2)It is possible indigenous populations interacted with the animal before Europeans.

pages.title: Steller's Sea Cow
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★★★$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:kelp$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
